description.value:
A well aimed devastating blow attempts to disable your target. Make a Strike. If you hit and inflict damage, the victim of this strike must make a @Check[fortitude|against:class] save, with a -3 penalty for a critical success on the initial strike.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} until the end of your next turn.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 4 rounds.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 4 rounds, is in an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} state for 2 hours, or drops to 0 hit points and dies (your choice).
